pychell API reference¶

Data¶

class pychell.reduce.data2d.BiasImage(input_file, output_path, parser)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.RawImage

Class for a single bias image.

Default initializer for a bias image.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

  • parser (Parser) – The parser object, must extend the Parser object.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.CHIRONMap(data)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.HardCodedOrderMap

Initialize a hard coded map.

Parameters

data (SpecDataImage) – The image this order map corresponds to.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.CHIRONParser¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.Parser

parse_image(data)¶

Parses the input file for the image only. It’s assumed the header has already been parsed.

Parameters

hdu_num (int) – Which header data unit the desired image is in, default to 0.

Returns

The data image, with shape=(ny, nx)

Return type

data_image (np.ndarray)

class pychell.reduce.data2d.CoAddedImage(input_file, base_images, orientation='x')¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

coadd(method='sum')¶

Co-adds the images

Kwargs:

method (str): Either sum or median.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.EmpiricalOrderMap(data, method)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.OrderMapImage

Base class for an empirically derived order map.

Attr:

trace_alg (function): The trace algorithm in order_map.py to call.

Initialize an empirically derived order map.

Parameters

  • data (SpecDataImage) – The data this order map corresponds to

  • method (str) – The name of the function in order_map.py to trace the orders.

save(order_map_image)¶

Saves the trace map image and list of dictionaries.

Parameters

order_map_image (np.ndarray) – An image of labels for each point.

trace_orders(redux_settings)¶

Traces the orders.

Parameters

redux_settings (dict) – The merged reduction settings dictionary.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.FlatFieldOrderMap(data, method=None)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.EmpiricalOrderMap

Orders determined by a flat field order map.

Initialize a flat field order map

Parameters

  • data (SpecDataImage) – The image this order map corresponds to.

  • method ([type], optional) – [description]. Defaults to trace_orders_from_flat_field.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.HardCodedOrderMap(data)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.OrderMapImage

Base class for a hard coded order map already stored in files. Must have attribute input_file.

Initialize a hard coded map.

Parameters

data (SpecDataImage) – The image this order map corresponds to.

Class for a master bias image.

individuals (list) – A list of the individual bias images which generate this master bias.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.OrderMapImage(data, input_file)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage

Base class for an order map image

data¶

The image this order map corresponds to.

Type

SpecDataImage

Initialize an order map image object.

Parameters

  • data (SpecDataImage) – The image this order map corresponds to.

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding order map file.

load()¶

Loads and returns the order map image and pickled dictionary file

Returns

The order map image list: The list of dictionaries for each order

Return type

np.ndarray

class pychell.reduce.data2d.Parser¶

Bases: object

Base class to help parse data for a given instrument.

correct_readmath(data, data_image)¶

Corrects the NDRS, BSCALE, and BZERO in place. image_corrected = (image_original / NDR - BZERO) / BSCALE

Parameters

  • data (SpecDataImage) – The SpecDataImage object this image corresponds to

  • data_image (np.ndarray) – The data image.

parse_image(filename)¶

Parses the input file for the image only. It’s assumed the header has already been parsed.

Parameters

filename (str) – The filename.

Returns

The data image, with shape=(ny, nx)

Return type

data_image (np.ndarray)

class pychell.reduce.data2d.RawImage(input_file, output_path, parser)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage

Base class for a raw, unmodified spectral data image (i.e., not modified other than possible readmath).

parser¶

The parser object, must extend the Parser object.

Type

Parser

Default initializer for a Raw image.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

  • parser (Parser) – The parser object, must extend the Parser object.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

  • parser (Parser) – The parser object, must extend the Parser object.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage(input_file, output_path)¶

Bases: object

A base class for a spectral echelle image.

input_file¶

The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

Type

str

base_input_file¶

The filename of the corresponding file with the path removed.

Type

str

output_path¶

The root output path for this run.

Type

str

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

static generate_data_cube(data_list)¶

Generates a data-cube (i.e., stack) of images.

Parameters

data_list (list) – A list of data objects.

Returns

The generated data cube, with shape=(n_images, ny, nx).

Return type

data_cube (np.ndarray)
